title: Tiger Woods' El Cardonal Golf Course To Open December 16
headline: Tiger Woods' El Cardonal Golf Course Opens Today
description: Tiger Woods' first course design -- the private El Cardonal course at Diamante in Mexico -- opens Tuesday, Dec. 16, but you don't have to wait for a tee time to see what it looks like. Check out the exclusive photos of Tiger's debut as a designer.
short_headline: Tiger Woods' El Cardonal Golf Course Opens Today
page_title: Tiger Woods' El Cardonal Golf Course Opens Today
slug: Tiger Woods' El Cardonal Golf Course Opens Today
body: Tiger Woods' first course design -- the private El Cardonal course at Diamante in Mexico -- opens Tuesday, Dec. 16, but you don't have to wait for a tee time to see what it looks like. Check out the exclusive photos of Tiger's debut as a designer.
